special_powers.name: SECRET INVASION: REVEALED
special_powers.description: When Captain America hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on his character card. You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on his character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with M10A #023 Captain America on the same click number.

special_powers.name: BATTLEFIELD PROMOTION: WORLDBREAKER
special_powers.description: When Hulk hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on his character card.  You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on his character card; on a result of 8 or higher, replace this character with M10A #013 Worldbreaker a number of clicks from its blue starting line equal to the number of clicks this character is from its starting line.  If the d6 roll was a 6 and Hulk has 6 or more Promotion Tokens replace this character on the same click number.

special_powers.name: LEMME GRAB SOMETHIN'
special_powers.description: Thing can use Super Strength.  Give Thing a move action when he has no action tokens and is not holding an object; after actions resolve, give him a standard light object from outside the game.

special_powers.name: BATTLEFIELD PROMOTION: GREEN GOBLIN
special_powers.description: When Green Goblin hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on his character card.  You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on his character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with M10A #018 Green Goblin on the same click number.

special_powers.name: GOD OF THUNDER
special_powers.description: Thor can use Willpower.

special_powers.name: MASTER OF THE STORM
special_powers.description: Opposing characters that are within 5 squares of Thor when he hits an opposing character with a ranged combat attack have "boot symbol" until your next turn.

special_powers.name: BATTLEFIELD PROMOTION: DARK PHOENIX
special_powers.description: When Marvel Girl hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on her character card.  When Marvel Girl would be KO'd, you may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on her character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with M10A #021 Dark Phoenix on its yellow starting line.  On a result of 10 or higher, the replaced character begins on its blue starting line.  If you rolled a 6 and the result is 12 or higher, the replaced character begins on its green starting line.

special_powers.name: BATTLEFIELD PROMOTION: STORM
special_powers.description: When Storm hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on her character card. You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on her character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with M10A #020 Storm on the same click number.

special_powers.name: BATTLEFIELD PROMOTION: EMMA FROST
special_powers.description: When White Queen hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on her character card. You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on her character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with M10A #014 Emma Frost on the same click number.

special_powers.name: ADAPTIVE ARMOR
special_powers.description: When Iron Man would take damage from a character assigned a relic or resource, Iron Man ignores that damage and rolls a d6. On a result of 1-3, deal Iron Man 1 unavoidable damage. This ability can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: STARK, RESILIENT
special_powers.description: Iron Man can use Outwit and the Sharpshooter ability.

special_powers.name: THE FUTURIST
special_powers.description: Iron Man can use Perplex and Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: SECRET INVASION: REVEALED
special_powers.description: When Weapon X hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on his character card. You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on his character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with M10A #022 Wolverine on the same click number.

special_powers.name: BATTLEFIELD PROMOTION: THING
special_powers.description: When The Thing hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on his character card. You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on his character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with M10A #003 Thing on the same click number.

special_powers.name: BATTLEFIELD PROMOTION: IRON MAN
special_powers.description: When Iron Man hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on his character card. You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on his character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with M10A #009 Iron Man on the same click number.

special_powers.name: HE'S NEVER BEEN THIS ANGRY...
special_powers.description: Worldbreaker can use Super Strength. If he hits with an attack using an object, deal 1 penetrating damage to the target after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: ...EVERYTHING HE SEES MAKES HIM ANGRIER
special_powers.description: Worldbreaker can use Charge and Plasticity. When Worldbreaker is hit with a ranged combat attack, after actions resolve, you may place him in a square adjacent to the attacker.

special_powers.name: YOU THINK YOU'RE SMART LIKE BANNER!
special_powers.description: When Worldbreaker is targeted by an opponent's Outwit or Perplex, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled. On a result of 4-6, he ignores that use of Outwit or Perplex.

special_powers.name: I'M IMMUNE TO YOUR CLUMSY PSYCHIC POWERS, DARLING
special_powers.description: Emma Frost possesses Battle Fury and can use Willpower. When she is the target of Penetrating/Psychic Blast, modify her defense by +2.

special_powers.name: YOU CANNOT HIDE FROM ME
special_powers.description: Emma Frost can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast and the Sharpshooter ability.

special_powers.name: SECONDARY MUTATION
special_powers.description: When this power appears, stop turning the dial. You may choose to click Emma Frost to click #8. Emma Frost can use Super Senses.

special_powers.name: TEAM ADVISOR
special_powers.description: Emma Frost can use Leadership and Outwit.

special_powers.name: BATTLEFIELD PROMOTION: MAGNETO
special_powers.description: When Magneto hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on his character card. You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on his character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with M10A #019 Magneto on the same click number.

special_powers.name: BATTLEFIELD PROMOTION: THOR
special_powers.description: When Thor hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on his character card. You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on his character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with M10A #005 Thor on the same click number.

special_powers.name: SECRET INVASION: REVEALED
special_powers.description: When Spider-Man hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on his character card. You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each Promotion Token on his character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with M10A #024 Spider-Man on the same click number.

special_powers.name: I WILL KILL THE ARACHNID
special_powers.description: When a character named Spider-Man is on the map, Green Goblin modifies his attack value by +1 and his defense value by -1.

special_powers.name: GOBLIN'S TRICKS
special_powers.description: Green Goblin can use Energy Explosion and Super Strength.  When Green Goblin uses Energy Explosion, damage dealt is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC DEBRIS
special_powers.description: Magneto begins the game without the Magnetic Debris.  If the Magnetic Debris is attached, Magneto modifies his defense and damage values by +1 and when Magneto is hit by a close combat attack, the attacker is dealt 1 unavoidable damage after the attack is resolved.  Magnetic Debris remains attached to Magneto until he takes damage from an opponent's attack.

special_powers.name: MASTER OF MAGNETISM
special_powers.description: Magneto can use Pulse Wave and Quake.  When he uses either and hits, attach the Magnetic Debris to him after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: ROYAL DUO
special_powers.description: If a friendly character named Black Panther is adjacent to Storm, modify both of their defense values by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: WINDRIDER
special_powers.description: Storm can use Super Senses.  When Storm has no action tokens, she can use Energy Shield/Deflection and may use Force Blast as a free action.

special_powers.name: THE DARKNESS WITHIN
special_powers.description: Dark Phoenix can use Super Senses but only evades the attack on a result of 6.  When Dark Phoenix KO's an opposing figure you may heal her of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: JEAN'S NOT HERE ANYMORE
special_powers.description: Dark Phoenix can use Pulse Wave and Telekinesis.

special_powers.name: MY SACRIFICE SAVES YOU ALL
special_powers.description: When this click is revealed stop turning the dial.  Dark Phoenix can't use Super Senses.  When Dark Phoenix takes damage, heal all other friendly characters that share a keyword with Dark Phoenix of 2 damage.

special_powers.name: SKRULL LOYALTY
special_powers.description: Other friendly characters with the Skrulls keyword can use the X-Men team ability.

special_powers.name: SKRULL INFILTRATOR
special_powers.description: Wolverine can use Charge and Stealth. When he uses Charge, Wolverine can use Improved Movement: Hindering.

special_powers.name: SKRULL MUTANT HYBRID
special_powers.description: Wolverine can use Regeneration and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: SKRULL LOYALTY
special_powers.description: Other Friendly characters with the Skrulls Keyword can use the Avengers team ability.

special_powers.name: BRINGING THE FIGHT TO THEM
special_powers.description: Captain America can use Charge and Plasticity.

special_powers.name: LEADING THE INVASION
special_powers.description: Captain America can use Leadership and Shape Change. When he uses Leadership and the result is 6, in addition to the normal effects you may remove an action token from an adjacent friendly character with the Skrulls keyword.

special_powers.name: SKRULL LOYALTY
special_powers.description: Other friendly characters with the Skrulls keyword can use the Spider-Man team ability.

special_powers.name: SKRULL IMPOSTER
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Charge and Leap/Climb.

special_powers.name: ZIPLINE
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Incapacitate. After actions resolve, you may place 1 hit character adjacent to Spider-Man or place Spider-Man adjacent to hit character. If you do Spider-Man may make a close combat attack against that character as a free action.
